summary: This is an email forwarding attachments related to the Epstein case, including proffer notes, an interview document, and photos, with instructions to save them in the Epstein witness folder. It indicates ongoing evidence collection and witness management in November 2019.

events.title: Email Forwarding Evidence Attachments
events.description: An email is sent forwarding attachments including proffer notes, an interview document, and photos related to the Epstein case, with instructions to save them in the Epstein witness folder.

keyFacts: The email, dated November 27, 2019, forwards attachments including 'Proffer of pdf', 'Interview_231.pdf', and 'Photos' for the Epstein case.
The attachments are to be saved in an 'Epstein witness folder' using a specific file naming convention, indicating organized evidence management.
The forwarded materials suggest ongoing investigative work involving witness proffers, interviews, and photographic evidence late in 2019.
